#Description: Change file Permissions; i. e. Read(4))^( Write(2))^( Execute(1); For User Group and Other; It is Either; An English Letter Or Octal Number; For Specific Permission;
#Syntax: chmod [OPTION]... MODE[^MODE]... FILE... ; chmod [OPTION]... OCTAL-MODE FILE... ; chmod [OPTION]... --reference=RFILE FILE...

#Description: Change Permission for files and directories recursively
